name: Daily Quests
description: Here are a collected of four daily quests. Hunter quest is to kill 125 of the marked animals. Farmers quest is to harvest 500 crops of the marked crops. Loggers quest is to chop down 100 trees of the marked trees. Miners quests is to mine 750 of the marked ores.

properties.Title: Quest Payment System
properties.UserDescription: Every 24 hours, citizens who are above the marked number in each catigory will have completed a "Quest". They will receive 10 euros and 1 rep.
